title: View Merged Branches
description: In Git, branches are used to develop features or isolate changes made to the codebase. After a branch has served its purpose, it is merged back into the main branch. However, it is important to keep track of which branches have been merged and which have not. This challenge will test your ability to view a list of all merged local branches.

meta.title: View Merged Branches in Git Playground
meta.description: Learn how to view a list of all merged local branches in a Git repository.
meta.keywords: git repository, git labs, branches, git, merged branches, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查看已合并分支
i18n.description: 在Git中，分支用于开发功能或隔离对代码库所做的更改。当一个分支完成其使命后，它会被合并回主分支。然而，跟踪哪些分支已被合并以及哪些分支尚未合并非常重要。本挑战将测试你查看所有已合并本地分支列表的能力。

meta.title: 在Git Playground中查看已合并分支
meta.description: 学习如何查看Git仓库中所有已合并的本地分支列表。
meta.keywords: Git仓库、Git实验室、分支、Git、已合并分支、Git Playground

verify.name: 验证是否成功查看
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
